repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Anvayavyabhicārapariṣkara is a rare text on Nyāya. No support material. In the left margin on folio 1v a sticker of shelf mark 35-3336 is glued and the number 117 is written in pink chalk on 1v. On folio 1v in the right margin again one sticker with printed number 117 and number 90 written in blue ink. Some folio are broken aroud edges, otherwise the condition of Manuscript is good. Last folio is not numberd.

msItem.title: Anvayavyabhicārapariṣkara
msItem.author: Paṭṭābhirām
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) anvayavyabhicārosao vibudhairapariṣkṛtaḥ Paṭṭābhirāmasudhi yaM prakaṭīkurute narāṃ kāraṇasatyepi kāryānu (1v 2) tpattiranvayavyabhicāra ityācakṣate |
msItem.finalRubric: (13r 1) iti śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ (13r 2) iti paṭṭābhirāma viracito anvayavyabhicāraparikṣṛtisāmañjasyamāssāndarśite (13r 3) satate bhūyāt hariḥ oṃ |

extent.measure: 13 written folio. Last folio is not numberd.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals are seen in the left margin on verso of the folio. Last folio is not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Good. Some folio are broken around edges and corners.

encodingDesc.p: Question mark and sqare bracket is used for doubful word. last folio number is added.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) anvayavyabhicārosao vibudhairapariṣkṛtaḥ Paṭṭābhirāmasudhi yaM prakaṭīkurute narāṃ kāraṇasatyepi kāryānu (1v 2) tpattiranvayavyabhicāra ityācakṣate
(12v 6) niṣṭhanunvitakāryyatāvacchedakasaṃbandhāvacchinnapratiyogitāvacchedakakārryatāvacchedaka (13 r 1) tvāvyabhicāra iti phalitam iti satyasmin [smaraṇiyyam?] iti śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ (13r 2) iti paṭṭābhirāma viracito anvayavyabhicāraparikṣṛtisāmañjasyamāssāndarśite (13r 3) satate bhūyāt hariḥ oṃ |
